Package com.example.qr_quest

Class QRDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.qr_quest.QRDatabase
  • public class QRDatabase
extends Object
    This class is used to handle the Firebase Cloud Firestore database operations related to QR codes. It allows to add and update QR codes, as well as to check if a specific QR code already exists in the database and update the users that scanned it.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static interface  QRDatabase.QRExistsCallback
      The interface for the callback method to be called when checking if a QR exists in the database.

    • Field Summary

        new_QR - The QR object that is being added or updated in the database

    • Method Detail

      • setQRExistsCallback

        public void setQRExistsCallback​(QRDatabase.QRExistsCallback existsCallback)
        Sets the callback object for QR existence check events.
        Parameters:
        existsCallback - The object implementing the QRExistsCallback interface

      • addQRCodeCheck

        public void addQRCodeCheck​(String username,
                           com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnSuccessListener<Boolean> listener)
        Checks if the specified QR code already exists in the database and adds it if it doesn't. Also updates the users that scanned the QR code.
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the user that scanned the QR code
        listener - An OnSuccessListener to receive a boolean indicating whether the operation was successful.

      • addQR

        public Map<String,​Object> addQR()
        Creates a map of QR code details.
        Returns:
        A map of QR code details.

      • addUserToQrCode

        public void addUserToQrCode​(android.content.Context context,
                            String username,
                            com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnSuccessListener<Boolean> listener)
        Adds a user to a QR code's scanned by list in the database.
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the application.
        username - The username of the user to be added.
        listener - The success listener for the addition.

      • getAllQRs

        public static void getAllQRs​(com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnSuccessListener<List<QR>> listener)
        Retrieves all QR codes from all users in the Firestore "Users" collection and returns them as a list.
        Parameters:
        listener - an OnSuccessListener that receives the list of QR codes

      • getUserQRs

        public static void getUserQRs​(String username,
                              com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnSuccessListener<QR[]> listener)
        Retrieves all QR codes associated with a given user from Firestore and returns them as an array.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user whose QR codes are to be retrieved
        listener - an OnSuccessListener that receives the array of QR codes

      • checkIfUserHasQR

        public static void checkIfUserHasQR​(String username,
                                    QR qrCode,
                                    com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnSuccessListener<Boolean> listener)
        Checks whether a given user has scanned a given QR code.
        Parameters:
        username - the username to check
        qrCode - the QR code to check
        listener - a listener that will be called with the result of the check

      • addComment

        public static void addComment​(String comment,
                              String username,
                              QR qrCode,
                              com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnSuccessListener<Boolean> listener)
        Adds a comment to a QR code in the database, associated with a specific user.
        Parameters:
        comment - the comment to add
        username - the username of the user adding the comment
        qrCode - the QR code to add the comment to
        listener - a listener that will be called with the result of the operation

      • getAllComments

        public static void getAllComments​(QR qrCode,
                                  com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnSuccessListener<HashMap> listener)
        Gets all comments associated with a specific QR code.
        Parameters:
        qrCode - the QR code to get comments for
        listener - a listener that will be called with the resulting map of comments

      • getQRRank

        public static void getQRRank​(String qrName,
                             com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnSuccessListener<Integer> listener)
        Retrieves the rank of a QR code based on its score compared to other QR codes in the database.
        Parameters:
        qrName - The name of the QR code for which to retrieve the rank.
        listener - An OnSuccessListener that will be called with the rank of the QR code as an Integer.

      • getHighestQR

        public static void getHighestQR​(String username,
                                com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnSuccessListener<QR> listener)
        Retrieves the QR document with the highest score that the specified user has scanned after querying through all QR codes in the collections.
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the user to check
        listener - A listener to be called with the resulting document snapshot

      • getLowestQR

        public static void getLowestQR​(String username,
                               com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnSuccessListener<QR> listener)
        Retrieves the QR document with the lowest score that the specified user has scanned after querying through all QR codes in the collections.
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the user to check
        listener - A listener to be called with the resulting document snapshot

      • deleteQR

        public static void deleteQR​(android.content.Context context,
                            QR qrCode,
                            com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnSuccessListener<Boolean> listener)
        Deletes a QR code from the database and updates the user's document and QR code document accordingly.
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the calling activity.
        qrCode - The QR code to be deleted.
        listener - An OnSuccessListener that listens for the completion of the deletion process and returns a boolean value indicating success or failure.

      • getAllScannedUsers

        public static void getAllScannedUsers​(String username,
                                      QR qrCode,
                                      com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnSuccessListener<List<String>> listener)
        Gets the list of users who have scanned a particular QR code.
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the current user.
        qrCode - The QR code for which the list of scanned users is requested.
        listener - An OnSuccessListener that listens for the completion of the retrieval process and returns a list of usernames that have scanned the QR code.
